湨字的基本解释

湨
jú
〔湨水〕水名，在中国河南省。

湨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jú］
［《廣韻》古闃切，入錫，見。］
水名。在河南省西北部，源出济源县西部，东南向流入黄河。参见“湨梁”。

湨字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　湨； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页638第06
【廣韻】【正韻】古闃切【集韻】【韻會】扃闐切，?音狊。水名。【春秋·襄十六年】會于湨梁。【註】湨水出河內軹縣。

湨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
湨字的起名意思

暂无。

湨
Basic explanation of words
湨
jú
〔湨水〕The name of the water is in Henan Province, China.
湨
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jú］
["Guangyun" Gu Xie cut into tin, see. ]
Water name. In the northwest of Henan Province, it originates from the west of Jiyuan County and flows into the Yellow River in the southeast. See "Xiaoliang".
湨
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　湨; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 638 06
[Guang Yun] [Positive Rhyme] Ancient Rhyme [Jiyun] [Rhyme Meeting] Xiantian cut,? Sound 狊. Water name. 【Chunqiu·Xiangxi Sixteenth Year】Meet in Xiaoliang. [Note] Xiaoshui flows out of Zhe County, Hanoi.
